attributes.action: create seperate parks only for dog owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am fed up with having to dodge dogs mess and worry about my children being mauled by dogs running about not on a lead, when i take them to the park to play on swings, or feed ducks etc, why not have separate parks which are only for dog owners, i am sure i am not alone in this wish, it would make it better for dog owners too
